Title: toIntervalSecond
Description: Returns an interval of n seconds of data type IntervalSecond.
n — Number of seconds. Integer numbers or string representations thereof, and float numbers. (U)Int*/Float*/String.
Examples: WITH    toDate('2024-06-15') AS date,    toIntervalSecond(30) AS interval_to_secondsSELECT date + interval_to_seconds AS result
